name: Jenkins
natural_language_description: 这是 Jenkins 节点。主要用于: Consume Jenkins API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: job

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll

triggerParamsNotice.displayName: Make sure the job is setup to support triggering with parameters. More info
triggerParamsNotice.name: triggerParamsNotice
triggerParamsNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Make sure the job is setup to support triggering with parameters. More info

job.name: job
job.description: Name of the job. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
job.natural_language_description: 参数名: Job Name or ID | 作用: Name of the job. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

param.name: param
param.natural_language_description: 参数名: Parameters | 作用: Parameters for Jenkins job | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

newJob.name: newJob
newJob.description: Name of the new Jenkins job
newJob.natural_language_description: 参数名: New Job Name | 作用: Name of the new Jenkins job | (必填项)

xml.name: xml
xml.natural_language_description: 参数名: XML | 作用: XML of Jenkins config | (必填项)

createNotice.displayName: To get the XML of an existing job, add ‘config.xml’ to the end of the job URL
createNotice.name: createNotice
createNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: To get the XML of an existing job, add ‘config.xml’ to the end of the job URL

reason.name: reason
reason.description: Freeform reason for quiet down mode
reason.natural_language_description: 参数名: Reason | 作用: Freeform reason for quiet down mode

instanceNotice.displayName: Instance operation can shutdown Jenkins instance and make it unresponsive. Some commands may not be available depending on instance implementation.
instanceNotice.name: instanceNotice
instanceNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Instance operation can shutdown Jenkins instance and make it unresponsive. Some commands may not be available depending on instance implementation.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50
